result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES: 15CM23, 15CM33 Defendant Daniel L Berg in court with attorney Chelsea Anne Whitley.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 8:55AM 15CM23 Ct 1: Def plea of G. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. DRI 15CM33. 

SENTENCING: w/h sent, prob 2 yrs- appear today, no abusive contact w/ diane montpetit, 60 days banked jail to be used by agent if necessary, $265.60 fine/cost- $25/mo PP beg 9/1/15 and 1st of e/m thereafter, 22 days sent credit. 9:06am adj.

Defendant Daniel L Berg in court with attorney Chelsea Anne Whitley.  Defendant Daniel L Berg in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:41 pm.  CT grants modification of bond.  Bond modified to $500 signature bond - all other non-monetary conditions continue.  Bond modified on its face.  1:46 pm adj.
for Bond Review.  Submitted by Atty Whitley
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint

Not to have contact with: Diane Montpetit.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.
